name: react-breadcrumbs-dynamic
description: React dynamic breadcrumbs extremely flexible and easy to use
author: Serguei Okladnikov <oklaspec@gmail.com>

scripts.gh-pages:_ismaster: if [ 'master' != `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` ]; then echo error: branch must be master; false ; fi
scripts.gh-pages:_isclean: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ] ; then echo error: workspace must be clean ; false ; fi
scripts.gh-pages:_isfinished: if [ -n "$(git branch --list gh-pages-add)" ] ; then echo error: branch gh-pages-add must not exists ; false ; fi
scripts.gh-pages:check: npm run gh-pages:_ismaster && npm run gh-pages:_isclean && npm run gh-pages:_isfinished
scripts.gh-pages:_branch: if [ -n "$(git branch --list gh-pages)" ]; then git checkout gh-pages; else git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf . && git checkout master package.json && git status && git commit --allow-empty -m 'initial commit' ; fi
scripts.gh-pages:_commit: cp package.json example && git checkout -b gh-pages-add && git add example && git commit -m `npm view . version`
scripts.gh-pages:_commitif: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ] ; then git commit -m `npm view . version` ; else echo nothin to commit ; fi
scripts.gh-pages:_clean: git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages-add
scripts.gh-pages:build: npm run gh-pages:_commit && npm run gh-pages:_filter && npm run gh-pages:_branch && npm run gh-pages:_pick && npm run gh-pages:_commitif && npm run gh-pages:_clean
scripts.gh-pages: npm run gh-pages:check && npm run build:example && npm run gh-pages:build
